title: Foundation Models for Pupillary Light Reflex Preprocessing in Glaucoma Screening
description: Benchmark comparing time-series foundation models (MOMENT, UniTS, TimesNet) against traditional methods (LOF, SVM, linear interpolation) for outlier detection and imputation in pupillary light reflex signals for glaucoma screening. Implements STRATOS-compliant evaluation across discrimination, calibration, clinical utility, and probability distributions.
notes: Software repository for: Foundation Models for Pupillary Light Reflex Preprocessing. Repository structure informed by TRIPOD+AI (Collins et al. 2024) and the anticipated TRIPOD-Code guidelines (Pollard et al. 2026).
